full_text:
Processing a Delinquency

Lesson
objectives ¢ Describe the delinquency lifecycle for a Past

Due delinquency

¢ Explain the role of delinquency reasons in
delinquency processing

* Track a delinquency using delinquency
events

¢ Interpret delinquency plans

¢ Test delinquency processing

i Past due delinquency Gi

Marcus
Business
Analyst

Sometimes policyholders miss a
payment. How does BillingCenter
handle the situation of an
overdue payment?

Marci (jy
Configuration ‘ss

Developer

An overdue payment
automatically initiates a
PastDue delinquency in
BillingCenter.

i Delinquency Gi

¢ Delinquency is a process that launches and coordinates the steps necessary to
handle an unexpected occurrence such as an overdue payment

¢ Policy is at risk for cancellation because of some inaction
« Aim is to get client back into compliance
¢ Most delinquencies are triggered automatically

* For example, a Past Due delinquency is triggered by the Invoice Due batch process when an
invoice is one day overdue

¢ Only accounts and policies can become delinquent
lt»

FE QName Belen Weber Account# DEM00S7O Oct 18, 2018 fr) [Policy Hoor-8WEBER-1 Accounts DEMO0S70 Oct18, 2018

Account Summary Policy Summary

‘A\ This account has one oF more active delinquencies: Past Due. {A\ This policy has one or more active delinquencies: Past Due.

i Delinquency handling resources: workflow Gi

¢ Aworkflow is a multistep process designed

to manage complex business processes
workflow events

¢ Workflows are well suited for delinquency

processing because they: Dunning Letter 1
« Encapsulate all logic for a business process in one
place Dunning Letter 2

* Define flows of logic with conditional branching workflow ABC Intent to Cancel

* Can execute steps immediately, wait for a time
period to pass, and/or wait for an external event to
occur

¢ BillingCenter users track the progress of a
delinquency processing by means of
workflow events

i Delinquency handling resources: delinquency plan [5

¢ Adelinquency behaves
according to the active
delinquency plan

¢ Every account has a
delinquency plan

¢ Apolicy may have a
delinquency plan

* Policy delinquency plan
takes precedence over
account delinquency
plan

delinquency S] => Late Fee: 50
plan @ \( ) Delinquency Reason & Workflow Type:
= \ YT Past Due > Workflow ABC

q Notice of intent to cancel sent to PAS

due date+15 49

Delinquency referred to collection agency

e
due date + 46

illingCenter receives payment for the ov je amount, delinquency is automatically closed.

i Moving the delinquency forward Gi

eu Many workflow events are date/time driven.
H The inception date is the date on which delinquency processing starts.

* Invoice Due launches a past due
delinquency.
> ° Workflow Writer “wakes” up a workflow

batch that is waiting on a date or elapsed
processes time.

system date

Workflows generate activities.

<< , ¢ An Approval activity blocks workflow processing until an
G authorized user approves or rejects the activity.

activity . \ Notification activity is for information only.

Test a delinquency

i Simulating a delinquency G

Marcus Now that | understand more

Business

Ng about delinquency processing,
I'd like to see a delinquency in
action so | know how to test a

ra delinquency.

Marci
Configuration
Developer

Good idea!
Let’s get started.

i Demonstration G

Test delinquency processing

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

_- — What purpose does the Workflow Writer batch process serve?

7
¢
¢

SSeS ee ee eee Soo Se Seoe

Answer Gi

_— — What purpose does the Workflow Writer batch process serve?

¢
a The Workflow Writer batch process checks for active workflows that are suspended

until a date has been reached or an amount of time has elapsed.

Soe ee ee eee Soo eSeoe Ss

Question

_- — How does BillingCenter know which workflow to use to process a given

oo delinquency?
¢

SSeS ee ee eee Soo Se Seoe

Gi

Answer

_~ — How does BillingCenter know which workflow to use to process a given
Pa delinquency?
¢

The delinquency plan associates each delinquency reason with the appropriate
workflow.

Soe ee ee eee Soo eSeoe Ss

Gi

Question

_- — How does a Billing Clerk know that a policy is in delinquency?

7
¢
¢

SSeS ee ee eee Soo Se Seoe

Answer Gi

a How does a Billing Clerk know that a policy is in delinquency?
Te Alert bars on the Account Summary and Policy Summary screens inform users of
an active delinquency. Also, delinquencies are listed on the My Delinquencies screen

on the Desktop.

Soe ee ee eee Soo eSeoe Ss

Question

¢

SSeS ee ee eee Soo Se Seoe

Gi

oo delinquency forward?

The Workflow Writer batch process needs to be run to “wake up” the workflow, which
is waiting on a date.

Question

_- — How does an approval activity influence workflow?

7
¢
¢

SSeS ee ee eee Soo Se Seoe

Answer Gi

,- — How does an approval activity influence workflow?
¢
o An approval activity blocks workflow processing until it is either approved or rejected.
Typically, the workflow performs different processing depending on the outcome of an
approval activity.

Soe ee ee eee Soo eSeoe Ss

i Delinquency plan

Now that I’m clear on the
delinquency lifecycle, |
need to know more about
delinquency plans.

A delinquency plan is the
link between a billing
issue such as an
overdue invoice and the
logic to handle the issue.

Marci
Configuration
Developer

i Delinquency plan: General tab

¢ Settings on General tab apply to all delinquencies handled by the plan

« Associates a workflow with each reason

* Specifies the timing of each workflow event
